name: Super Happy Funtime Shootout 6: GOTY EDITION
name_original: Super Happy Funtime Shootout 6: GOTY EDITION
description:
Armed to the teeth with a slew of various elemental weapons. It falls on one blob man's shoulders(?) to save the world.  'Super Happy Funtime Shootout 6: GOTY EDITION' features groundbreaking elemental chain reactions unique to each gun. So pick up your weapon, pick your poison... electric, ground, fire, or ice power, and get shooting!

The game was designed to be played on the web, however, a javascript error occasionally occurs when using the pistol. A downloadable 'exe' file is available if this error persists.
